name: Jammerball
description:
Jammerball is a sports game based on dodgeball and inspired by the classic arcade game Windjammers.

There are 8 teams in Jammerball, and all of them have their own unique arena. Each team has a specific weakness in some aspect of the game, with only two exceptions: one with no weaknesses, and one with all of them.Playable teams
Drunken Brothers (all weaknesses) – Drunken Dome
Broken Wings (weak speed) – Wingless Garden
The Scratchers (weak shooting potency) – Little Claw Palace
Tired Spirits (weak energy recharging speed) – Yawning Center
Exhausteds (weak total energy) – Weakness Palace
Rubber Souls (weak resistance) – Bouncing Colliseum
Soapy Hands (weak catching ability) – Slippery Ground
Mighty Highers (no weaknesses) – The Very Best GardenMain Features
3 Difficulty Levels
Cooperative mode
Versus mode (1vs1 & 2vs2)
8 different teams to play
8 unique arenas
